vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
MultiplicatorX4.multiply (patch_11.sol#20-24) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _adr.transfer(this.balance * 4) (patch_11.sol#23)

solc-version

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_11.sol:
